scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Five typescripts of the story board accompanying a 35mm slide presentation, "Saga of the Afro-American Soldiers in the Abraham Lincoln Brigade." Each typescript has different handwritten edits. Accompanying the scripts is a list of African-American volunteers. The slide show covers African-American history from Crispus Attucks to the Spanish Civil War. Includes two trays of 35mm slides.
